snippet: The Islanders traded their captain, defenseman Mark Streit, to the Philadelphia Flyers for a minor league forward, Shane Harper, and a fourth-round draft pick in 2014.
abstract: New York Islanders trade defenseman Mark Streit to Philadelphia Flyers for minor league forward Shane Harper and a fourth-round pick in 2014 draft; other NHL developments noted.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders traded their captain, defenseman Mark Streit, to the Philadelphia Flyers for a minor league forward, Shane Harper, and a fourth-round draft pick in 2014.
